price: E dEle é o Louvor, nos céus e na terra e na noite, e quando entrardes no tempo merídio.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِيّٗا وَحِينَ تُظۡهِرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-ḥamdu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waʿashiyyan waḥīna tuẓ'hirūna
